zone.name: Westfall
zone.description: Once fertile farmland, Westfall has fallen on hard times. Golden fields lie untended, harvest constructs run amok, and the Defias Brotherhood gathers strength in the shadows.

connections.description: Path to Duskwood (not yet available)

locations.name: Westfall Border
locations.description: A dusty road leads from the forests of Elwynn into the wide, windswept plains of Westfall.

connections.description: Return to Elwynn Forest.
Follow the road deeper into Westfall.

points_of_interest.name: Broken Wagon
points_of_interest.description: An abandoned wagon with missing wheels — a sign of the area's decline.

locations.name: Dusty Road
locations.description: The main road through northern Westfall, flanked by overgrown fields and crumbling fences.

connections.description: Head back toward Elwynn.
A rutted path leads to a farmstead.
The road continues toward a watchtower on the horizon.
Fields stretch toward a distant farmhouse.

locations.name: Furlbrow's Farm
locations.description: A dilapidated farmstead where the Furlbrows cling to what little they have left.

connections.description: Return to the main road.
A dirt track heads toward the coast.

points_of_interest.name: Collapsed Barn
points_of_interest.description: A barn roof has caved in, straw spilling out.

points_of_interest.name: Dry Well
points_of_interest.description: A stone well long since gone dry.

locations.name: Sentinel Hill
locations.description: A fortified hilltop encampment built around a central watchtower. The People’s Militia rallies here to reclaim Westfall.

connections.description: The main road leads back toward Elwynn.
Fields stretch toward a working farm.
Abandoned fields lie to the east.
A ruined town can be seen in the distance.
Rocky hills rise to the south.
The smell of salt and kelp drifts in from the coast.

points_of_interest.name: Central Tower
points_of_interest.description: A wooden tower with a commanding view of the plains.

points_of_interest.name: Militia Camp
points_of_interest.description: Makeshift tents and weapon racks for the People's Militia.

points_of_interest.name: Signal Fire
points_of_interest.description: A ready pile of logs to warn Stormwind if Westfall falls.

locations.name: Saldean's Farm
locations.description: One of the few farms still producing crops. The Saldeans work tirelessly despite the danger.

connections.description: A wagon track joins the main road.
The militia's beacon rises on the horizon.
Abandoned fields stretch away.

points_of_interest.name: Grain Silos
points_of_interest.description: Tall silos filled with the season's harvest.

points_of_interest.name: Chicken Coop
points_of_interest.description: A rickety coop still full of clucking chickens.

locations.name: The Dead Acres
locations.description: Fields once fertile now lie fallow. Harvest constructs patrol mindlessly among the withered crops.

connections.description: The hilltop encampment watches over the fields.
Return to the working farm.
A mine entrance looms near a rocky rise.

points_of_interest.name: Broken Scarecrow
points_of_interest.description: A tattered scarecrow beaten by the wind.

points_of_interest.name: Idle Harvester
points_of_interest.description: A rusted harvest golem stands motionless—until it doesn't.

locations.name: Jangolode Mine
locations.description: A tunnel complex seized by the Defias. Miners were driven out; bandits now dig for their own profit.

connections.description: A narrow path climbs back to the fields.
A hidden trail leads toward the ruined town.

locations.name: Moonbrook
locations.description: A once-thriving town now a Defias stronghold. Red bandanas flutter from broken windows.

connections.description: The militia's beacon is visible in the distance.
A path cuts toward the mine.
An ominous cavern yawns to the south.
Rocky hills surround the town's outskirts.

points_of_interest.name: Abandoned Inn
points_of_interest.description: A gutted inn where Defias gather.

points_of_interest.name: Hidden Cache
points_of_interest.description: Crates marked with the Defias sigil are stacked in an alley.

locations.name: Deadmines Entrance
locations.description: A cavern entrance concealed behind Moonbrook. The air smells of powder and damp rope — the Defias plot within.

connections.description: Return to the ruined streets of Moonbrook.
A narrow trail climbs into the hills.
Descend into the mine tunnels.

locations.name: Deadmines Tunnels
locations.description: Cramped mine shafts reinforced with rotting beams. Defias sentries watch every shadow.

connections.description: Climb back toward the entrance.
Follow the tracks deeper into the mine.

locations.name: Goblin Foundry
locations.description: An underground workshop where goblin engineers forge weapons for the Defias.

connections.description: Return to the tunnels.
Rails lead toward an underground dock.

locations.name: Smuggler's Docks
locations.description: An underground cove housing a hidden Defias ship. Torches reflect off dark waters.

connections.description: Tracks lead back toward the foundry.
Board the Defias ship.

locations.name: VanCleef's Quarters
locations.description: The captain's quarters aboard the Defias vessel. VanCleef plots rebellion here.

connections.description: Return to the docks.

points_of_interest.name: Captain's Table
points_of_interest.description: Maps of Stormwind shipping routes are spread across the table.

points_of_interest.name: Armory Crates
points_of_interest.description: Crates of weapons stamped with the Defias sigil.

locations.name: The Longshore
locations.description: Westfall's coastline. Waves crash against the shore while murlocs build crude huts among the wreckage of ships.

connections.description: A trail leads back inland.
The beacon fires of Sentinel Hill are visible farther inland.
A lighthouse rises along the coast.

points_of_interest.name: Shipwreck
points_of_interest.description: Barnacle-encrusted timbers jut from the sand.

points_of_interest.name: Murloc Huts
points_of_interest.description: Tide-washed shacks made of driftwood and seaweed.

locations.name: Westfall Lighthouse
locations.description: A lonely lighthouse stands watch over the cliffs. Its keeper keeps the flame alive despite meager supplies.

connections.description: Follow the coast northward.
A rocky path climbs toward the hills.

points_of_interest.name: Lightkeeper's Quarters
points_of_interest.description: A sparse living space filled with nautical charts.

points_of_interest.name: Beacon Flame
points_of_interest.description: A bright flame fueled by dwindling oil reserves.

locations.name: Dagger Hills
locations.description: Jagged hills and rocky ridges shelter Defias camps and prowling beasts. The terrain gives ambushers an advantage.

connections.description: The beacon atop Sentinel Hill is visible over the ridges.
A narrow pass leads back toward Moonbrook.
A hidden trail slips down toward the mine entrance.
A rough track descends toward the sea.
A forest road winds toward the dark woods of Duskwood. (Not yet available)

points_of_interest.name: Bandit Camp
points_of_interest.description: Tents and stolen crates hidden between boulders.

points_of_interest.name: Overlook Ridge
points_of_interest.description: A vantage point with a sweeping view of Westfall's plains.
